rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual information without high-potency language.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports characteristic of the disease; lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes the virus strain and relation to past virus, not capability or preparedness.
The segment reports strain type and relation, not prices or numerical metrics.
The segment identifies the strain and its relation to a previous virus, not future relief or improvement.
Segment contains no direct quotes or attributed statements.
Factual description of virus strain using descriptive term ('circulating').
